author: Special Correspondent
text: Chief Minister Jayalalithaa has announced solatium to families of 23 victims, who died of electrocution and in other incidents across the State. In a statement, Ms. Jayalalithaa expressed her condolences and announced a solatium of Rs. 3 lakh to each of the families of victims, who died of electrocution and Rs. 1 lakh to each of the 7 families of victims, who died in other incidents. The solatium would be granted from the Chief Minister's Public Relief Fund.
title: Solatium announced
